00030 
00031 TypeBox::TypeBox(QWidget* parent): QGroupBox(tr("Search for: "), parent),
00032 searchAbstractors_(this),
00033 searchAbstractionDefs_(this), searchBusDefs_(this), searchComponents_(this),
00034 searchDesigns_(this), searchDesignConfs_(this), searchGeneratorChains_(this),
00035 settings_(){
00036 
00037         // set the texts for the check boxes
00038         searchAbstractors_.setText(tr("Abstractors"));
00039         searchAbstractionDefs_.setText(tr("Abstraction Definitions"));
00040         searchBusDefs_.setText(tr("Bus Definitions"));
00041         searchComponents_.setText(tr("Components"));
00042         searchDesigns_.setText(tr("Designs"));
00043         searchDesignConfs_.setText(tr("Design Configurations"));
00044         searchGeneratorChains_.setText(tr("Generator Chains"));
00045 
00046         // set all checkBoxes to checked
00047         searchAbstractors_.setChecked(true);
00048         searchAbstractionDefs_.setChecked(true);
00049         searchBusDefs_.setChecked(true);
00050         searchComponents_.setChecked(true);
00051         searchDesigns_.setChecked(true);
00052         searchDesignConfs_.setChecked(true);
00053         searchGeneratorChains_.setChecked(true);
00054 
00055         // connect all check boxes to inform if their state is changed
00056         connect(&searchAbstractors_, SIGNAL(stateChanged(int)),
00057                         this, SLOT(onCheckStateChanged()), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00058         connect(&searchAbstractionDefs_, SIGNAL(stateChanged(int)),
00059                         this, SLOT(onCheckStateChanged()), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00060         connect(&searchBusDefs_, SIGNAL(stateChanged(int)),
00061                         this, SLOT(onCheckStateChanged()), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00062         connect(&searchComponents_, SIGNAL(stateChanged(int)),
00063                         this, SLOT(onCheckStateChanged()), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00064         connect(&searchDesigns_, SIGNAL(stateChanged(int)),
00065                         this, SLOT(onCheckStateChanged()), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00066         connect(&searchDesignConfs_, SIGNAL(stateChanged(int)),
00067                         this, SLOT(onCheckStateChanged()), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00068         connect(&searchGeneratorChains_, SIGNAL(stateChanged(int)),
00069                         this, SLOT(onCheckStateChanged()), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00070 
00071         // the layout to manage the layout of the group box
00072         QVBoxLayout* layout = new QVBoxLayout(this);
00073 
00074         // add widgets to layout and set stretch to the bottom so check boxes are
00075         // always aligned to the top of the group box
00076         layout->addWidget(&searchAbstractors_);
00077         layout->addWidget(&searchAbstractionDefs_);
00078         layout->addWidget(&searchBusDefs_);
00079         layout->addWidget(&searchComponents_);
00080         layout->addWidget(&searchDesigns_);
00081         layout->addWidget(&searchDesignConfs_);
00082         layout->addWidget(&searchGeneratorChains_);
00083         layout->addStretch();
00084 }
00085 
00086 TypeBox::~TypeBox() {
00087 }
00088 
00089 void TypeBox::onCheckStateChanged() {
00090 
00091         // update the settings
00092         settings_.abstractors_ = searchAbstractors_.isChecked();
00093         settings_.abstractionDefs_ = searchAbstractionDefs_.isChecked();
00094         settings_.busDefs_ = searchBusDefs_.isChecked();
00095         settings_.components_ = searchComponents_.isChecked();
00096         settings_.designs_ = searchDesigns_.isChecked();
00097         settings_.designConfs_ = searchDesignConfs_.isChecked();
00098         settings_.generatorChains_ = searchGeneratorChains_.isChecked();
00099 
00100         // inform the change outside
00101         emit stateChanged(&settings_);
00102 }
